data.title: Search API V2 Generally Available
description: The V2 Search API includes several performance improvements while maintaining the same request and response object as the V1 Search.

It is recommended that iVectorOne users migrate to the API v2 stable endpoints as soon as possible. We expect to eventually End-Of-Life (EOL) API v1 in favor of API v2 as more API v2 endpoints are announced as stable.
Further guidance on when API v1.1 will be discontinued will be communicated at a future date.
